HomePage.description: Full Stack Developer with over 3 years of experience. Developing interfaces and software is not just a skill, but a true passion. Specializing in programming languages ​​and technologies such as JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, React Native Next JS, Node JS, HTML, CSS, Sass and other cutting-edge technologies in the area, with a focus on Frontend.
HomePage.title: Professional Experience
HomePage.text01: JavaScript/TypeScript: Expertise in ES6+, Ember.js. Frameworks and Libraries: ReactJS, NextJS, VueJS, NodeJS. BFF (Backend for Frontend) Integrations: Experience with REST APIs. Styling: Proficient in Sass, Styled Components, Tailwind CSS, Material UI. Progressive Web Apps (PWAs): Creating responsive and accessible websites.
HomePage.text02: Tools: Jest, Cypress. Clean Code: Writing clean, accessible, and reusable code.
HomePage.text03: Tools: Figma, Storybook. JS Ecosystem: Babel, Webpack.
HomePage.text04: Databases: MongoDB, Firebase. Additional Languages: Java (Maven, Spring Boot), Kotlin. Containers: Docker.
HomePage.objective: My goal is to continue growing as a professional, developing high-quality products, transforming lives, and learning new technologies. I am constantly seeking new challenges that allow me to apply my skills and contribute to innovative projects. A proponent of agile methodologies, I believe in the rapid and continuous delivery of value.
HomePage.contactTitle: Ready to start a project and boost your online product?
